title: Thursday, June 7th at Viva Tango Michael Nadtochi workshop and milonga, Michael is DJing, 8pm-11:45pm
content: Michael Nadtochi  Repetitive Rhythms if Tango Vals  Thursday June 7th The elegance of the romantic Tango Vals will be explored this week in Michael’s workshop on Repetitive Rhythms of Tango-Vals. A milonga will follow the workshop with Michael Ding.    45 Stockton St Princeton NJ  8 PM Doors Open  Lesson 8:10 to 9 PM  Milonga 9 to 11:45 PM  DJing by Michael        Socialize at our food Table  Partner not needed  Beginners welcome  Off street lighted parking  Cost $15  (students $5)     Michael Nadtochi has been a professional dancer for more than two decades. His vast dance experience consists of performing, competing, choreographing and educating dancers and professionals all over the world.  For the past 14 years Michael focused entirely on performing and teaching the art of Argentine Tango. He has traveled the world, took part in major international tango festivals where he taught and performed at some of the most spectacular venues. Germany, Italy, Denmark, Turkey, Russia, Belarus, Cyprus, Malaysia, Canada, Scotland are among the countries that he visited as special guests and performing artist. He has taught and performed in the major tango festivals in the USA, and he has been one of the dancers at Malbec & Tango House NYC -  the first authentic nightly Argentine Tango show produced in USA.  *********Special Announcement **********  FUN!! Viva Tango organizes Jewelry, Shoes and Tango clothes sale and exchange on June 21st. Dear ladies! Tired of some of your jewelry or clothes? Please bring them in for sale/exchange! Put the price/your name/phone number on the tag. We will provide table/clothes rack/additional light. For details/questions/suggestions please contact Yelena, 732-406-7118(call/text)  COMING EVENTS  6/14  Johana Copes & Leo Sardella  6/21 Pablo Garcia Gomez and Iwona Ionescu Jewelry exchange/sale!  6/28 Jacklyn Shapiro and Roberto Pena  7/5 Pablo Garcia Gomez and Iwona Ionescu  7/12 Jacklyn Shapiro and Roberto Pena  7/19 Michael Nadtochi  7/26 Live Music by IL FAUT

Michael Nadtochi

Repetitive Rhythms if Tango Vals

 Thursday June 7th

The elegance of the romantic Tango Vals will be explored this week in Michael’s workshop on Repetitive Rhythms of Tango-Vals. A milonga will follow the workshop with Michael Ding. 45 Stockton St Princeton NJ 8 PM Doors Open Lesson 8:10 to 9 PM Milonga 9 to 11:45 PM DJing by Michael Socialize at our food Table Partner not needed Beginners welcome Off street lighted parking Cost $15  (students $5) Michael Nadtochi has been a professional dancer for more than two decades. His vast dance experience consists of performing, competing, choreographing and educating dancers and professionals all over the world.  For the past 14 years Michael focused entirely on performing and teaching the art of Argentine Tango. He has traveled the world, took part in major international tango festivals where he taught and performed at some of the most spectacular venues. Germany, Italy, Denmark, Turkey, Russia, Belarus, Cyprus, Malaysia, Canada, Scotland are among the countries that he visited as special guests and performing artist. He has taught and performed in the major tango festivals in the USA, and he has been one of the dancers at Malbec & Tango House NYC -  the first authentic nightly Argentine Tango show produced in USA. *********Special Announcement ********** FUN!! Viva Tango organizes Jewelry, Shoes and Tango clothes sale and exchange on June 21st. Dear ladies! Tired of some of your jewelry or clothes? Please bring them in for sale/exchange! Put the price/your name/phone number on the tag. We will provide table/clothes rack/additional light. For details/questions/suggestions please contact Yelena, 732-406-7118(call/text) COMING EVENTS 6/14  Johana Copes & Leo Sardella 6/21 Pablo Garcia Gomez and Iwona Ionescu Jewelry exchange/sale! 6/28 Jacklyn Shapiro and Roberto Pena 7/5 Pablo Garcia Gomez and Iwona Ionescu 7/12 Jacklyn Shapiro and Roberto Pena 7/19 Michael Nadtochi 7/26 Live Music by IL FAUT
